dmca.title: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: BR [mailto:brcopyright@pacbell.net] 
Sent: Saturday, December 03, 2005 11:33 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement

DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
 
Date: 12/3/05
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries George Poletes,
Legal Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
Fax: 214.782.7801
Email: copyright@theplanet.com, legal-response@theplanet.com
 
Dear ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.:
 
Per 17 USC section 512, I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY
that I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of
certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named Barry Rosen("IP
Owner").  I have a good faith belief that the links or materials identified
in the addendum attached hereto are not authorized by the above IP Owner,
its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according
to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove
or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 
I may be contacted at:
 
Name: Barry Rosen
Email: brcopyright@pacbell.net
 
Truthfully,
 
Barry Rosen



Addendum to Notice of Infringement:
List of Infringing Items Or Materials
 
 
Name of Intellectual Property Owner:
Barry Rosen
 
 
The following items are located on your servers/network at the links listed
below:
 
1) Item/Material: Photo of Amy Weber

Links:
 
http://www.fotochicas.com/a/AmyWeber/AmyWeber441.htm
http://www.fotochicas.com/a/AmyWeber/amy13.jpg

2) Item/Material: Photo of Traci Bingham

Links:
http://www.fotochicas.com/t/TraciBingham/TraciBingham25154.htm
http://www.fotochicas.com/t/TraciBingham/traci10.jpg

3) Item/Material: Photo of Traci Bingham

Links:
http://www.fotochicas.com/t/TraciBingham/TraciBingham25156.htm
http://www.fotochicas.com/t/TraciBingham/traci12.jpg



Please note:
For the purpose of expediency, all infringing items have been combined into
one document but shall still comprise 3 separate DMCA Notices of Copyright
Infringement.

Because I have recently found quite a number of very serious infringing
websites on your servers that feature celebrity photos, I must now put you
on notice that all such websites featuring this material are problematic
under the terms of the DMCA. Because you should now have both full and
constructive knowledge about said activities, your continued support and
fostering of such infringing activities eliminates any safe harbor defenses
under the DMCA and you can and will be hell fully liable as a contributory
infringer for any future infringements related to your hosting of websites
featuring celebrity photos.
